amendment.description: Amendment sought to increase funding for the Office of China Compliance by $6 million.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 4 printed in the Congressional Record to increase appropriations for the International Trade Administration (by transfer) by $6 million, and reduce appropriations for the Bureau of the Census.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Rogers (MI) amendment Failed by recorded vote: 200 - 228 (Roll no. 720).
